title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Dr. <!--more--> Julian Whitaker and he is one of the nation’s most prominent and respected alternative medical practitioners and a specialist in orthomolecular medicine, diabetes, heart disease, cancer and anti-aging.
He has degrees from Dartmouth, Emory University School of Medicine.
He is the founder of the Whitaker Wellness Institute in Newport Beach, California, which has treated over 25,000 patients with comprehensive protocols involving diet, nutrition, exercise and lifestyle changes.
Dr Whitaker is the author many books including “Reversing Diabetes”, “Reversing Heart Disease”, “A Guide to Natural Healing” and “The Pain Relief Breakthrough”.
www.DrWhitaker.com
